document_data.name: Investiture of Flame
document_data.mainbody: '''''Investiture of flame''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that wreathed the caster in swirling protective [[fire|flames]] that could also be used as a form of attack.
document_data.Effects: The spell created bright flames that ran harmlessly around the caster's body and lasted for up to 10 minutes, as long as the caster kept concentrating. The flames rendered the caster immune to all forms of fire and conferred magical resistance to cold. They also burned any creature that came too close, and could shoot out at the caster's command as bolts that reached as far as {{SI|15|ft|long=yes}} and burned all creatures along their paths.
document_data.Components: The spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
